compare_measurements module

This module creates plots with all measurements per sample and sensor.

copyright

  1. 2022 by Matthias Muhr, Hochschule-Bonn-Rhein-Sieg

license

see LICENSE for more details.

compare_measurements.compare(root_path, properties)[source]

This is the main function of the module. It reads all files with data from one sensor and all measurements. Plots are created.

Parameters

  • root_path (string) – path to foot folder

  • properties (dictionary) – properties is a dictionary with all parameters for evaluating the data

compare_measurements.plot(df, sensor, path, names, properties)[source]

This function creates plots from the passed data. One plot per sensor and sample with all measurements.

Parameters

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – Dataframe with prepared data from measurements

  • name (string) – name of sensor and sample

  • path (string) – path to root folder

  • () (names) – list with name of measurements

  • properties (dictionary) – properties is a dictionary with all parameters for evaluating the data

compare_measurements.read(path, sensor, root_path, properties)[source]

This function reads files with the data of the individual sensors with all measurements, prepares them and passes them to the plot function.

Parameters

  • path (string) – path to file

  • name (string) – name of sensor and sample

  • root_path (string) – path to foot folder

  • properties (dictionary) – properties is a dictionary with all parameters for evaluating the data

compare_measurements.save_fig(fig, path, name)[source]

This function saves the fig object in the folder “resultsplotsplots_compare”.

Parameters

  • fig (Object) – figure to save

  • path (string) – path to root folder

  • name (string) – figures name
